verses.verse: Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> "Build <S%H1129><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> altars, <S%H4196><s%> and prepare <S%H3559><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams. <S%H352><s%>"

Balak <S%H1111><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Balaam <S%H1109><s%> had spoken; <S%H1696><s%> and Balak <S%H1111><s%> and Balaam <S%H1109><s%> offered <S%H5927><s%> on every altar <S%H4196><s%> a bull <S%H6499><s%> and a ram. <S%H352><s%>

Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> "Stand <S%H3320><s%> by your burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and I will go: <S%H3212><s%> perhaps Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H7136><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> me; <S%H1697><s%> and whatever he shows <S%H7200><s%> me I will tell <S%H5046><s%> you. <S%H3212><s%>" He went to a bare height. <S%H8205><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> met <S%H7136><s%> Balaam: <S%H1109><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H6186><s%> "I have prepared the seven <S%H7651><s%> altars, <S%H4196><s%> and I have offered <S%H5927><s%> up a bull <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on every altar. <S%H4196><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in Balaam <S%H1109><s%>'s mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Return <S%H7725><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> and thus you shall speak. <S%H1696><s%>"
He returned <S%H7725><s%> to him, <S%H5324><s%> and behold, he was standing by his burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> he, <S%H8269><s%> and all the princes of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

He took up <S%H5375><s%> his parable, <S%H4912><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "From Aram <S%H758><s%> has Balak <S%H1111><s%> brought <S%H5148><s%> me, <S%H4428><s%> the king of Moab <S%H4124><s%> from the mountains <S%H2042><s%> of the East. <S%H6924><s%> Come, <S%H3212><s%> curse <S%H779><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for me. <S%H3212><s%> Come, defy <S%H2194><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
How <S%H4100><s%> shall I curse <S%H5344><s%> whom God <S%H410><s%> has not cursed? <S%H6895><s%> How shall I defy <S%H2194><s%> whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has not defied? <S%H2194><s%>

For from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the rocks <S%H6697><s%> I see <S%H7200><s%> him. <S%H1389><s%> From the hills I see him. <S%H7789><s%> Behold, it is a people <S%H5971><s%> that dwells <S%H7931><s%> alone, <S%H910><s%> and shall not be reckoned <S%H2803><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

Who can count <S%H4487><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> or number <S%H4557><s%> the fourth <S%H7255><s%> part of Israel? <S%H3478><s%> Let me die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the righteous! <S%H3477><s%> Let my last end be like his! <S%H319><s%>"

Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> "What have you done <S%H6213><s%> to me? <S%H3947><s%> I took you to curse <S%H6895><s%> my enemies, <S%H341><s%> and behold, <S%H1288><s%> you have blessed them altogether. <S%H1288><s%>"
He answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Must I not take heed <S%H8104><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> that which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> puts <S%H7760><s%> in my mouth? <S%H6310><s%>"

Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3212><s%> "Please come with me to another <S%H312><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> where you may see <S%H7200><s%> them; <S%H7200><s%> you shall see but <S%H657><s%> the utmost <S%H7097><s%> part of them, <S%H7200><s%> and shall not see them all: <S%H6895><s%> and curse me them from there."

He took <S%H3947><s%> him into the field <S%H7704><s%> of Zophim, <S%H6839><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah, <S%H6449><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars, <S%H4196><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> up a bull <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on every altar. <S%H4196><s%>
He said <S%H559><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> "Stand <S%H3320><s%> here <S%H3541><s%> by your burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> while I meet <S%H7136><s%> over there. <S%H3541><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> met <S%H7136><s%> Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Return <S%H7725><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> and say this. <S%H559><s%>"

He came <S%H935><s%> to him, <S%H5324><s%> and behold, he was standing by his burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> with him. <S%H1111><s%> Balak said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3068><s%> "What has Yahweh spoken? <S%H1696><s%>"

He took up <S%H5375><s%> his parable, <S%H4912><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Rise up, <S%H6965><s%> Balak, <S%H1111><s%> and hear! <S%H8085><s%> Listen <S%H238><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> you son of Zippor. <S%H6834><s%>

God <S%H410><s%> is not a man, <S%H376><s%> that he should lie, <S%H3576><s%> nor the son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> that he should repent. <S%H5162><s%> Has he said, <S%H559><s%> and will he not do <S%H6213><s%> it? <S%H1696><s%> Or has he spoken, and will he not make it good? <S%H6965><s%>
Behold, <S%H3947><s%> I have received a command to bless. <S%H1288><s%> He has blessed, <S%H1288><s%> and I can't <S%H7725><s%> reverse it.

He has not seen <S%H5027><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> in Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Neither has he seen <S%H7200><s%> perverseness <S%H5999><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> is with him. <S%H8643><s%> The shout of a king is among them. <S%H4428><s%>
God <S%H410><s%> brings them out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> He has as it were the strength <S%H8443><s%> of the wild ox. <S%H7214><s%>

Surely there is no enchantment <S%H5173><s%> with Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> Neither is there any divination <S%H7081><s%> with Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Now <S%H6256><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> What has God <S%H410><s%> done! <S%H6466><s%>

Behold, <S%H5971><s%> the people rises up <S%H6965><s%> as a lioness, <S%H3833><s%> As a lion <S%H3833><s%> he lifts himself up. <S%H5375><s%> He shall not lie down <S%H7901><s%> until he eat <S%H398><s%> of the prey, <S%H2964><s%> and drinks <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the slain. <S%H2491><s%>"
Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> "Neither curse <S%H5344><s%> them at all, <S%H6895><s%> nor bless <S%H1288><s%> them at all. <S%H6895><s%>"

But Balaam <S%H1109><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Balak, <S%H1111><s%> "Didn't <S%H1696><s%> I tell you, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H3068><s%> 'All that Yahweh speaks, <S%H1696><s%> that I must do? <S%H6213><s%>'"

Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> "Come <S%H3212><s%> now, <S%H3947><s%> I will take you to another <S%H312><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> perhaps it will please <S%H3474><s%> God <S%H430><s%> that you may curse me them from there. <S%H6895><s%>"
Balak <S%H1111><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Peor, <S%H6465><s%> that looks <S%H8259><s%> down <S%H6440><s%> on the desert. <S%H3452><s%>

Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> "Build <S%H1129><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> altars, <S%H4196><s%> and prepare <S%H3559><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams. <S%H352><s%>"
Balak <S%H1111><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Balaam <S%H1109><s%> had said, <S%H559><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> up a bull <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on every altar. <S%H4196><s%>
